### hasTiedDef() {#a52a80d854cd5cff3ba2b98e4323eb125}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool hasTiedDef (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42; MRI, unsigned reg)</>}

<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LRE may clone a virtual register because dead code elimination causes it to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Prio;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Stage == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4aa1960643af2f8c3fe5c97a4cda996619">RS&#95;Split</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Unsplit ranges that couldn&#39;t be allocated immediately are deferred until</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// everything else has been allocated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Prio = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Stage == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4ae983c4728340c2ff4e464b1eb59016ac">RS&#95;Memory</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Memory operand should be considered last.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Change the priority such that Memory operand are assigned in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the reverse order that they came in.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Make this a member variable and probably do something about hints.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-instrprofiling-cpp-/#ab90df0bea341a2cd835e25e236bac68ba33d2873b27c32fae6c504cf50d742381">MemOp</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Prio = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-instrprofiling-cpp-/#ab90df0bea341a2cd835e25e236bac68ba33d2873b27c32fae6c504cf50d742381">MemOp</a>++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Giant live ranges fall back to the global assignment heuristic, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prevents excessive spilling in pathological cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetRegisterClass &amp;RC = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#aba058f684e1b6704e5b4a09f889ec18c">MRI</a>-&gt;getRegClass(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ForceGlobal = RC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass/#a9d429efd1c7b47b6045ae08a72acfe4c">GlobalPriority</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       (!ReverseLocalAssignment &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex/#a5b8b6416308ea52c3b8712b32764c9fea0d0c291488b64cffb191fda8a4e90ef0">SlotIndex::InstrDist</a>) &gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            (2 &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#aa6330bc662bf646d769c2a0771282eaf">RegClassInfo</a>.getNumAllocatableRegs(&amp;RC)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GlobalBit = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Stage == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4ab9fd263985d7038e6bf2aa95b9d78f71">RS&#95;Assign</a> &amp;&amp; !ForceGlobal &amp;&amp; !LI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange/#a66ff664a97cd3c30de7e873335a0c075">empty</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a575345318339b28557a6c8ea57708434">LIS</a>-&gt;intervalIsInOneMBB(LI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allocate original local ranges in linear instruction order. Since they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are singly defined, this produces optimal coloring in the absence of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// global interference and other constraints.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ReverseLocalAssignment)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Prio = LI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange/#a9b4b2c1bb443279588bd6582ad6a86b2">beginIndex</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex/#addead5fcbbc3d5611ee3b43c184d99b0">getApproxInstrDistance</a>(Indexes-&gt;getLastIndex());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allocating bottom up may allow many short LRGs to be assigned first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to one of the cheap registers. This could be much faster for very</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// large blocks on targets with many physical registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Prio = Indexes-&gt;getZeroIndex().getApproxInstrDistance(LI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange/#aa1bc5510e870a77ebe055b1524d9fd26">endIndex</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allocate global and split ranges in long-&gt;short order. Long ranges that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// don&#39;t fit should be spilled (or split) ASAP so they don&#39;t create</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// interference.  Mark a bit to prioritize global above local ranges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Prio = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">      GlobalBit = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Priority bit layout:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 31 RS&#95;Assign priority</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 30 Preference priority</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if (RegClassPriorityTrumpsGlobalness)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   29-25 AllocPriority</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   24 GlobalBit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   29 Global bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   28-24 AllocPriority</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 0-23 Size/Instr distance</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clamp the size to fit with the priority masking scheme</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Prio = std::min(Prio, (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af80bd4ec8a9b2f8e7d9d75ab708a55c2">maxUIntN</a>(24));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a87e65296f2a6d9570117a852af342764">isUInt&lt;5&gt;</a>(RC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass/#ad33e9f6afa3710617ba9cc7396209f4b">AllocationPriority</a>) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;allocation priority overflow&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegClassPriorityTrumpsGlobalness)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Prio |= RC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass/#ad33e9f6afa3710617ba9cc7396209f4b">AllocationPriority</a> &lt;&lt; 25 | GlobalBit &lt;&lt; 24;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Prio |= GlobalBit &lt;&lt; 29 | RC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass/#ad33e9f6afa3710617ba9cc7396209f4b">AllocationPriority</a> &lt;&lt; 24;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mark a higher bit to prioritize global and local above RS&#95;Split.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Prio |= (1u &lt;&lt; 31);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Boost ranges that have a physical register hint.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a96bb57a8041a40ded1ba0ef3b411a615">VRM</a>-&gt;hasKnownPreference(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Prio |= (1u &lt;&lt; 30);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Prio;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Providing that the variable being spilled does not look like a loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// induction variable, which is expensive to spill around and better</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pushed into a condition inside the loop if possible, provide a strong</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// negative bias on through blocks to prevent unwanted liveness on loop</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PrefSpill = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">MCRegister RAGreedy::tryRegionSplit(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LiveInterval &amp;VirtReg,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BlockFrequency BestCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we can split this live range around a compact region.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasCompact = calcCompactRegion(GlobalCand.front());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HasCompact) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Yes, keep GlobalCand&#91;0&#93; as the compact region candidate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumCands = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BestCost = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency/#a5bd2a8de4fde83093df0cc2415db2312">BlockFrequency::max</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No benefit from the compact region, our fallback will be per-block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// splitting. Make sure we find a solution that is cheaper than spilling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BestCost = SpillCost;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BestCand = calculateRegionSplitCost(VirtReg, Order, BestCost,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No solutions found, fall back to single block splitting.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that it is possible to have an interval that is live-in or live-out</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// while only covering a single block - A phi-def can use undef values from</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != NumGaps &amp;&amp; RI != RE; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for Uses&#91;I&#93; &lt;= RMS &lt;= Uses&#91;I + 1&#93;.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex/#a19695ead28a0fbdcea66c6253aebc44f">SlotIndex::isEarlierInstr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1&#93;, RMS&#91;RI&#93;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip a regmask on the same instruction as the last use. It doesn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// overlap the live range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex/#a0b73244049319d841fd11a238f35b5d1">SlotIndex::isSameInstr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1&#93;, RMS&#91;RI&#93;) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1 == NumGaps)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39; &#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; RMS&#91;RI&#93; &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;:&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;-&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RegMaskGaps.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Advance ri to the next gap. A regmask on one of the uses counts in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// both gaps.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RI != RE &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex/#a19695ead28a0fbdcea66c6253aebc44f">SlotIndex::isEarlierInstr</a>(RMS&#91;RI&#93;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1&#93;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ++RI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since we allow local split results to be split again, there is a risk of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// creating infinite loops. It is tempting to require that the new live</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ranges have less instructions than the original. That would guarantee</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// convergence, but it is too strict. A live range with 3 instructions can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// split 2+3 (including the COPY), and we want to allow that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Instead we use these rules:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 Allow any split for ranges with getStage() &lt; RS&#95;Split2. (Except for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    noop split, of course).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 Require progress be made for ranges with getStage() == RS&#95;Split2. All</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    the new ranges must have fewer instructions than before the split.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3 New ranges with the same number of instructions are marked RS&#95;Split2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    smaller ranges are marked RS&#95;New.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These rules allow a 3 -&gt; 2+3 split once, which we need. They also prevent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// excessive splitting and infinite loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ProgressRequired = ExtraInfo-&gt;getStage(VirtReg) &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4a19273cebb739bf7e6bf1acc0393c6dad">RS&#95;Split2</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1649"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Best split candidate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BestBefore = NumGaps;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1652"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BestAfter = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">float</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BestDiff = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">float</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> blockFreq =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SpillPlacer-&gt;getBlockFrequency(BI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a6d25ab70a5fda1310dad85ddb8ecaa22">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a3aa22d521bd6a7e6b9f35545dc7b0f1e">getNumber</a>()).getFrequency() &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (1.0f / MBFI-&gt;getEntryFreq().getFrequency());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;float, 8&gt;</a> GapWeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1659"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> PhysReg : Order) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PhysReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of the largest spill weight that would need to be evicted in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order to make use of PhysReg between UseSlots&#91;I&#93; and UseSlots&#91;I + 1&#93;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><span class="doxyHighlight">    calcGapWeights(PhysReg, GapWeight);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove any gaps with regmask clobbers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1667"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a865e0247c5f922b8afaaaec481e4939c">Matrix</a>-&gt;checkRegMaskInterference(VirtReg, PhysReg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1668"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Gap : RegMaskGaps)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1669"><span class="doxyHighlight">        GapWeight&#91;Gap&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa3bc1efc2622aa9bf1e0d05b3d9600de">huge&#95;valf</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1670"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1671"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to find the best sequence of gaps to close.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1672"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The new spill weight must be larger than any gap interference.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1673"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1674"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We will split before Uses&#91;SplitBefore&#93; and after Uses&#91;SplitAfter&#93;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1675"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SplitBefore = 0, SplitAfter = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1676"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1677"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MaxGap should always be max(GapWeight&#91;SplitBefore..SplitAfter-1&#93;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1678"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is the spill weight that needs to be evicted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1679"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">float</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxGap = GapWeight&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1680"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1681"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1682"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Live before/after split?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1683"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LiveBefore = SplitBefore != 0 || BI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a4c7b9375634dd9b55f130ae4c428475c">LiveIn</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1684"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LiveAfter = SplitAfter != NumGaps || BI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a42e9b38c4f9bc0c0aca6f0c8c5cd1f80">LiveOut</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1685"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1686"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af085ea923a328b9fa6a1975f1a4ff987">printReg</a>(PhysReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a523cbc58f79fe5e9e95dc87f9cee8a36">TRI</a>) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39; &#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;SplitBefore&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1687"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;-&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;SplitAfter&#93; &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; I=&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; MaxGap);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1688"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1689"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Stop before the interval gets so big we wouldn&#39;t be making progress.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1690"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LiveBefore &amp;&amp; !LiveAfter) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1691"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; all\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1692"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1693"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1694"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Should the interval be extended or shrunk?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1695"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Shrink = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1696"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1697"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// How many gaps would the new range have?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1698"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewGaps = LiveBefore + SplitAfter - SplitBefore + LiveAfter;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1699"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1700"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Legally, without causing looping?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1701"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/irsimilarity/#af46430106334db52bfa7a4107e53a0bda8f7357506e00d8cd0694f948f909865d">Legal</a> = !ProgressRequired || NewGaps &lt; NumGaps;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1702"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1703"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/irsimilarity/#af46430106334db52bfa7a4107e53a0bda8f7357506e00d8cd0694f948f909865d">Legal</a> &amp;&amp; MaxGap &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa3bc1efc2622aa9bf1e0d05b3d9600de">huge&#95;valf</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1704"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Estimate the new spill weight. Each instruction reads or writes the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1705"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register. Conservatively assume there are no read-modify-write</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1706"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1707"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to guess the size of the new interval.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">float</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EstWeight = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aea0a52847ac687ee3f8d144b248ebae0">normalizeSpillWeight</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><span class="doxyHighlight">            blockFreq &#42; (NewGaps + 1),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;SplitBefore&#93;.distance(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;SplitAfter&#93;) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"><span class="doxyHighlight">                (LiveBefore + LiveAfter) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex/#a5b8b6416308ea52c3b8712b32764c9fea0d0c291488b64cffb191fda8a4e90ef0">SlotIndex::InstrDist</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><span class="doxyHighlight">            1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Would this split be possible to allocate?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Never allocate all gaps, we wouldn&#39;t be making progress.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; w=&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; EstWeight);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EstWeight &#42; <a href="#a121070ba7388da52c72cbb1929ebd594">Hysteresis</a> &gt;= MaxGap) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Shrink = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">float</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Diff = EstWeight - MaxGap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Diff &gt; BestDiff) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1721"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; (best)&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><span class="doxyHighlight">            BestDiff = <a href="#a121070ba7388da52c72cbb1929ebd594">Hysteresis</a> &#42; Diff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1723"><span class="doxyHighlight">            BestBefore = SplitBefore;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><span class="doxyHighlight">            BestAfter = SplitAfter;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to shrink.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Shrink) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (++SplitBefore &lt; SplitAfter) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; shrink\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recompute the max when necessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GapWeight&#91;SplitBefore - 1&#93; &gt;= MaxGap) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><span class="doxyHighlight">            MaxGap = GapWeight&#91;SplitBefore&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = SplitBefore + 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != SplitAfter; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><span class="doxyHighlight">              MaxGap = std::max(MaxGap, GapWeight&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1740"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1741"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MaxGap = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to extend the interval.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SplitAfter &gt;= NumGaps) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; extend\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MaxGap = std::max(MaxGap, GapWeight&#91;SplitAfter++&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Didn&#39;t find any candidates?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BestBefore == NumGaps)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1773"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the new range has the same number of instructions as before, mark it as</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Early abort: too many interferences.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CutOffInfo |= CO&#95;Interf;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LiveInterval &#42;Intf : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(Q.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/query/#a6d5858ffe61498c3109205046a16a98b">interferingVRegs</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Intf is done and sits on the same register class as VirtReg, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would not be recolorable as it is in the same state as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VirtReg. However there are at least two exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If VirtReg has tied defs and Intf doesn&#39;t, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there is still a point in examining if it can be recolorable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Additionally, if the register class has overlapping tuple members, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may still be recolorable using a different tuple. This is more likely</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if the existing assignment aliases with the candidate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (((ExtraInfo-&gt;getStage(&#42;Intf) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4ab3dc0864c572a7f8895334b0f8d235d4">RS&#95;Done</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#aba058f684e1b6704e5b4a09f889ec18c">MRI</a>-&gt;getRegClass(Intf-&gt;reg()) == CurRC &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><span class="doxyHighlight">            !<a href="#a6e87024d7fe817808e0288f6b213d40c">assignedRegPartiallyOverlaps</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a523cbc58f79fe5e9e95dc87f9cee8a36">TRI</a>, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a96bb57a8041a40ded1ba0ef3b411a615">VRM</a>, PhysReg, &#42;Intf)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1901"><span class="doxyHighlight">           !(<a href="#a52a80d854cd5cff3ba2b98e4323eb125">hasTiedDef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#aba058f684e1b6704e5b4a09f889ec18c">MRI</a>, VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a14d46e70db7e417c8ed5bc66fb295185">reg</a>()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1903"><span class="doxyHighlight">          FixedRegisters.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#a2a98f19750ba941ce791b75ca6d77e48">count</a>(Intf-&gt;reg())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1905"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Early abort: the interference is not recolorable.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1907"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1909"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1910"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1911"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1912"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1913"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1914"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// tryLastChanceRecoloring - Try to assign a color to \\p VirtReg by recoloring</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1915"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// its interferences.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1916"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Last chance recoloring chooses a color for \\p VirtReg and recolors every</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1917"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// virtual register that was using it. The recoloring process may recursively</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1918"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// use the last chance recoloring. Therefore, when a virtual register has been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1919"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// assigned a color by this mechanism, it is marked as Fixed, i.e., it cannot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1920"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// be last-chance-recolored again during this recoloring &quot;session&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1921"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// E.g.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1922"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Let</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1923"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vA can use &#123;R1, R2    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1924"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vB can use &#123;    R2, R3&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1925"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vC can use &#123;R1        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1926"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Where vA, vB, and vC cannot be split anymore (they are reloads for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1927"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instance) and they all interfere.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1928"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1929"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vA is assigned R1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1930"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vB is assigned R2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1931"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vC tries to evict vA but vA is already done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1932"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Regular register allocation fails.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1933"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1934"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Last chance recoloring kicks in:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1935"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vC does as if vA was evicted =&gt; vC uses R1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1936"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vC is marked as fixed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1937"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vA needs to find a color.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1938"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// None are available.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1939"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vA cannot evict vC: vC is a fixed virtual register now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1940"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vA does as if vB was evicted =&gt; vA uses R2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1941"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vB needs to find a color.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1942"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// R3 is available.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1943"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Recoloring =&gt; vC = R1, vA = R2, vB = R3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1944"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1945"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p Order defines the preferred allocation order for \\p VirtReg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1946"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p NewRegs will contain any new virtual register that have been created</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1947"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (split, spill) during the process and that must be assigned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1948"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p FixedRegisters contains all the virtual registers that cannot be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1949"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// recolored.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1950"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1951"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p RecolorStack tracks the original assignments of successfully recolored</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1952"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1953"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1954"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p Depth gives the current depth of the last chance recoloring.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1955"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\return a physical register that can be used for VirtReg or ~0u if none</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1956"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// exists.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1957"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RAGreedy::tryLastChanceRecoloring(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LiveInterval &amp;VirtReg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1958"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           AllocationOrder &amp;Order,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1959"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           SmallVectorImpl&lt;Register&gt; &amp;NewVRegs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1960"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1d6cfdcc234093f39fb0719ddb649500">SmallVirtRegSet</a> &amp;FixedRegisters,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1961"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           RecoloringStack &amp;RecolorStack,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1962"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1963"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a523cbc58f79fe5e9e95dc87f9cee8a36">TRI</a>-&gt;shouldUseLastChanceRecoloringForVirtReg(&#42;MF, VirtReg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1964"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ~0<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea7b774effe4a349c6dd82ad4f4f21d34c">u</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1965"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1966"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Try last chance recoloring for &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; VirtReg &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1967"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1968"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ssize&#95;t EntryStackSize = RecolorStack.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1969"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1970"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ranges must be Done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1971"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((ExtraInfo-&gt;getStage(VirtReg) &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4ab3dc0864c572a7f8895334b0f8d235d4">RS&#95;Done</a> || !VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a1a07a284547e2997c90a6a1be428cd47">isSpillable</a>()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1972"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Last chance recoloring should really be last chance&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set the max depth to LastChanceRecoloringMaxDepth.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1974"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We may want to reconsider that if we end up with a too large search space</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for target with hundreds of registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1976"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Indeed, in that case we may want to cut the search space earlier.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> &gt;= <a href="#a7cb5fe98d703c4aa2bfec263ae6db0fa">LastChanceRecoloringMaxDepth</a> &amp;&amp; !<a href="#a0f14d670a4b600adab212ed51ad70059">ExhaustiveSearch</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1978"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Abort because max depth has been reached.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CutOffInfo |= CO&#95;Depth;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ~0<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea7b774effe4a349c6dd82ad4f4f21d34c">u</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1999"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is only possible to recolor virtual register interference.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2000"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a865e0247c5f922b8afaaaec481e4939c">Matrix</a>-&gt;checkInterference(VirtReg, PhysReg) &gt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2015"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2016"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RecoloringCandidates contains all the virtual registers that interfere</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2017"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with VirtReg on PhysReg (or one of its aliases). Enqueue them for</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2019"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PQueue RecoloringQueue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2020"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LiveInterval &#42;RC : RecoloringCandidates) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2022"><span class="doxyHighlight">      enqueue(RecoloringQueue, RC);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2042"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we cannot recolor all the interferences, we will have to start again</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2044"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1d6cfdcc234093f39fb0719ddb649500">SmallVirtRegSet</a> SaveFixedRegisters(FixedRegisters);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2050"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not mess up with the global assignment process.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2079"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2080"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2081"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Roll back our unsuccessful recoloring. Also roll back any successful</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2082"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// recolorings in any recursive recoloring attempts, since it&#39;s possible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2083"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// they would have introduced conflicts with assignments we will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2084"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// restoring further up the stack. Perform all unassignments prior to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2085"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reassigning, since sub-recolorings may have conflicted with the registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2086"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we are going to restore to their original assignments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2087"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ssize&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = RecolorStack.size() - 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &gt;= EntryStackSize; --<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2088"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LiveInterval &#42;LI;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2090"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::tie(LI, PhysReg) = RecolorStack&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2091"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2098"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MCRegister PhysReg;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange/#a66ff664a97cd3c30de7e873335a0c075">empty</a>() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#aba058f684e1b6704e5b4a09f889ec18c">MRI</a>-&gt;reg&#95;nodbg&#95;empty(LI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a14d46e70db7e417c8ed5bc66fb295185">reg</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2101"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a865e0247c5f922b8afaaaec481e4939c">Matrix</a>-&gt;assign(&#42;LI, PhysReg);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pop the stack of recoloring attempts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RecolorStack.resize(EntryStackSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2107"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Last chance recoloring did not worked either, give up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ~0<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea7b774effe4a349c6dd82ad4f4f21d34c">u</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2110"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2111"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// tryRecoloringCandidates - Try to assign a new color to every register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in \\RecoloringQueue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p NewRegs will contain any new virtual register created during the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// recoloring process.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p FixedRegisters&#91;in/out&#93; contains all the registers that have been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// recolored.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\return true if all virtual registers in RecoloringQueue were successfully</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// recolored, false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint8&#95;t CutOffEncountered = CutOffInfo &amp; (CO&#95;Depth | CO&#95;Interf);</span></CodeLine>
