<Link id="l02180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2180"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2181"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Using a CSR for the first time has a cost because it causes push|pop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to be added to prologue|epilogue. Splitting a cold section of the live</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// range can have lower cost than using the CSR for the first time;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Spilling a live range in the cold path can have lower cost than using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the CSR for the first time. Returns the physical register if we decide</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to use the CSR; otherwise return 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2188"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> RAGreedy::tryAssignCSRFirstTime(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp;VirtReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocationorder">AllocationOrder</a> &amp;Order, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint8&#95;t &amp;CostPerUseLimit, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;Register&gt;</a> &amp;NewVRegs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ExtraInfo-&gt;getStage(VirtReg) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4a9cd7330a76c1cb3b85bc898ff6d80fba">RS&#95;Spill</a> &amp;&amp; VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a1a07a284547e2997c90a6a1be428cd47">isSpillable</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We choose spill over using the CSR for the first time if the spill cost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is lower than CSRCost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SA-&gt;analyze(&amp;VirtReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (calcSpillCost() &gt;= CSRCost)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2196"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PhysReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are going to spill, set CostPerUseLimit to 1 to make sure that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we will not use a callee-saved register in tryEvict.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CostPerUseLimit = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ExtraInfo-&gt;getStage(VirtReg) &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4aa1960643af2f8c3fe5c97a4cda996619">RS&#95;Split</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We choose pre-splitting over using the CSR for the first time if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the cost of splitting is lower than CSRCost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SA-&gt;analyze(&amp;VirtReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumCands = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> BestCost = CSRCost; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t modify CSRCost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BestCand = calculateRegionSplitCost(VirtReg, Order, BestCost,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2210"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 NumCands, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;IgnoreCSR&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BestCand == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06af9883480b45663348fb5529c563fd6f2">NoCand</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the CSR if we can&#39;t find a region split below CSRCost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2213"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PhysReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2214"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform the actual pre-splitting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    doRegionSplit(VirtReg, BestCand, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;HasCompact&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, NewVRegs);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2220"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2221"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2222" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ragreedy/#af4e3fe7472622039e7a9f5a54e584ec4"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ragreedy/#af4e3fe7472622039e7a9f5a54e584ec4">RAGreedy::aboutToRemoveInterval</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp;LI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not keep invalid information around.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SetOfBrokenHints.remove(&amp;LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2225"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2226"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2227"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RAGreedy::initializeCSRCost() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We use the larger one out of the command-line option and the value report</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by TRI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CSRCost = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2231"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::max((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)<a href="#a7c5964328fbfa78124c785ac876cd6df">CSRFirstTimeCost</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>-&gt;getCSRFirstUseCost()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CSRCost.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency/#a8e9ed6b20c2503f66f1fd0725297aedc">getFrequency</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2233"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Raw cost is relative to Entry == 2^14; scale it appropriately.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t ActualEntry = MBFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineblockfrequencyinfo/#aa9c041cb61532576659d652739439acc">getEntryFreq</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency/#a8e9ed6b20c2503f66f1fd0725297aedc">getFrequency</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ActualEntry) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CSRCost = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2239"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t FixedEntry = 1 &lt;&lt; 14;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ActualEntry &lt; FixedEntry)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CSRCost &#42;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a>(ActualEntry, FixedEntry);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ActualEntry &lt;= UINT32&#95;MAX)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invert the fraction and divide.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CSRCost /= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a>(FixedEntry, ActualEntry);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Can&#39;t use BranchProbability in general, since it takes 32-bit numbers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CSRCost =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2250"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a>(CSRCost.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency/#a8e9ed6b20c2503f66f1fd0725297aedc">getFrequency</a>() &#42; (ActualEntry / FixedEntry));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2251"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2252"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Collect the hint info for \\p Reg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The results are stored into \\p Out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p Out is not cleared before being populated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2256"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RAGreedy::collectHintInfo(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>, HintsInfo &amp;Out) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MachineInstr &amp;Instr : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#aba058f684e1b6704e5b4a09f889ec18c">MRI</a>-&gt;reg&#95;nodbg&#95;instructions(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!TII-&gt;isFullCopyInstr(Instr))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2259"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for the other end of the copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> OtherReg = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a173a2217e059f21fb25908fa2bf796d6">Instr</a>.getOperand(0).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2262"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OtherReg == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2263"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OtherReg = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a173a2217e059f21fb25908fa2bf796d6">Instr</a>.getOperand(1).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2264"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OtherReg == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2265"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2266"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2267"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the current assignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2268"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MCRegister OtherPhysReg =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2269"><span class="doxyHighlight">        OtherReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#affdbf5b92ed7e01352e2f39466efbe21">isPhysical</a>() ? <Link id="l02270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Push the collected information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Out.push&#95;back(HintInfo(MBFI-&gt;getBlockFreq(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a173a2217e059f21fb25908fa2bf796d6">Instr</a>.getParent()), OtherReg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2272"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           OtherPhysReg));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2274"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2275"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Using the given \\p List, compute the cost of the broken hints if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p PhysReg was used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\return The cost of \\p List for \\p PhysReg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2279"><span class="doxyHighlight">BlockFrequency RAGreedy::getBrokenHintFreq(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HintsInfo &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acefe92adee8725ad904c7c43649790e8a4ee29ca12c7d126654bd0e5275de6135">List</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BlockFrequency <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = BlockFrequency(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2282"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HintInfo &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acefe92adee8725ad904c7c43649790e8a4ee29ca12c7d126654bd0e5275de6135">List</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2283"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.PhysReg != PhysReg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2284"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.Freq;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2287"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2288"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Using the register assigned to \\p VirtReg, try to recolor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// all the live ranges that are copy-related with \\p VirtReg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The recoloring is then propagated to all the live-ranges that have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// been recolored and so on, until no more copies can be coalesced or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it is not profitable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For a given live range, profitability is determined by the sum of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// frequencies of the non-identity copies it would introduce with the old</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and new register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2297"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RAGreedy::tryHintRecoloring(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LiveInterval &amp;VirtReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have a broken hint, check if it is possible to fix it by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reusing PhysReg for the copy-related live-ranges. Indeed, we evicted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// some register and PhysReg may be available for the other live-ranges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2301"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SmallSet&lt;Register, 4&gt; Visited;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SmallVector&lt;unsigned, 2&gt; RecoloringCandidates;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  HintsInfo <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a14d46e70db7e417c8ed5bc66fb295185">reg</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2305"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MCRegister PhysReg = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a96bb57a8041a40ded1ba0ef3b411a615">VRM</a>-&gt;getPhys(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start the recoloring algorithm from the input live-interval, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it will propagate to the ones that are copy-related with it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Visited.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#afcadfef2cf37c3e6dbdbc9cd7bea50a0">insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  RecoloringCandidates.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2310"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Trying to reconcile hints for: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af085ea923a328b9fa6a1975f1a4ff987">printReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a523cbc58f79fe5e9e95dc87f9cee8a36">TRI</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2312"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;(&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af085ea923a328b9fa6a1975f1a4ff987">printReg</a>(PhysReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a523cbc58f79fe5e9e95dc87f9cee8a36">TRI</a>) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;)\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2313"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = RecoloringCandidates.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2316"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We cannot recolor physical register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>.isPhysical())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2319"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2320"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This may be a skipped register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a96bb57a8041a40ded1ba0ef3b411a615">VRM</a>-&gt;hasPhys(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2323"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#aee328fb90c6cef95857090cdc67de0d4">shouldAllocateRegister</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2324"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;We have an unallocated variable which should have been handled&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2325"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2326"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2327"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2328"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the live interval mapped with this virtual register to be able</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2329"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to check for the interference with the new color.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2330"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LiveInterval &amp;LI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a575345318339b28557a6c8ea57708434">LIS</a>-&gt;getInterval(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MCRegister CurrPhys = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a96bb57a8041a40ded1ba0ef3b411a615">VRM</a>-&gt;getPhys(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that the new color matches the register class constraints and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that it is free for this live range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurrPhys != PhysReg &amp;&amp; (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#aba058f684e1b6704e5b4a09f889ec18c">MRI</a>-&gt;getRegClass(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>)-&gt;contains(PhysReg) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2335"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a865e0247c5f922b8afaaaec481e4939c">Matrix</a>-&gt;checkInterference(LI, PhysReg)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2336"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2337"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2358"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// equal, we consider this is profitable because it may expose</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2361"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recolor the live-range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2362"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a865e0247c5f922b8afaaaec481e4939c">Matrix</a>-&gt;unassign(LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2363"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a865e0247c5f922b8afaaaec481e4939c">Matrix</a>-&gt;assign(LI, PhysReg);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2372"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2373"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2374"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Try to recolor broken hints.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2375"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Broken hints may be repaired by recoloring when an evicted variable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2376"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// freed up a register for a larger live-range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2377"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Consider the following example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2378"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BB1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2379"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   a =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2380"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   b =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2381"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BB2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2382"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2383"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   = b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2384"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   = a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2385"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Let us assume b gets split:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2386"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BB1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2387"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   a =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2388"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   b =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2389"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BB2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2390"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   c = b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2391"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2392"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   d = c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2393"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   = d</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2394"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   = a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2395"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Because of how the allocation work, b, c, and d may be assigned different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2396"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// colors. Now, if a gets evicted later:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2397"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BB1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2398"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   a =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2399"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   st a, SpillSlot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2400"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   b =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2401"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BB2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2402"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   c = b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2403"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2404"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   d = c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2405"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   = d</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2406"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   e = ld SpillSlot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2407"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   = e</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2408"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is likely that we can assign the same register for b, c, and d,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2409"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// getting rid of 2 copies.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2410"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RAGreedy::tryHintsRecoloring() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2411"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LiveInterval &#42;LI : SetOfBrokenHints) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2412"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a14d46e70db7e417c8ed5bc66fb295185">reg</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#ab203bbcbc320180b1da9e9a92ee0c784">isVirtual</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2413"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Recoloring is possible only for virtual registers&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2414"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some dead defs may be around (e.g., because of debug uses).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2415"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore those.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2416"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a96bb57a8041a40ded1ba0ef3b411a615">VRM</a>-&gt;hasPhys(LI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a14d46e70db7e417c8ed5bc66fb295185">reg</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2417"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    tryHintRecoloring(&#42;LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2420"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2421"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2422"><span class="doxyHighlight">MCRegister RAGreedy::selectOrSplitImpl(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LiveInterval &amp;VirtReg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2423"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       SmallVectorImpl&lt;Register&gt; &amp;NewVRegs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2424"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1d6cfdcc234093f39fb0719ddb649500">SmallVirtRegSet</a> &amp;FixedRegisters,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2425"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       RecoloringStack &amp;RecolorStack,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2426"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t CostPerUseLimit = uint8&#95;t(~0u);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First try assigning a free register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Order =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2430"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocationorder/#a1d17986988f0819f29d78d1be8555c9e">AllocationOrder::create</a>(VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a14d46e70db7e417c8ed5bc66fb295185">reg</a>(), &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a96bb57a8041a40ded1ba0ef3b411a615">VRM</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#aa6330bc662bf646d769c2a0771282eaf">RegClassInfo</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a865e0247c5f922b8afaaaec481e4939c">Matrix</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MCRegister PhysReg =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2432"><span class="doxyHighlight">          tryAssign(VirtReg, Order, NewVRegs, FixedRegisters)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When NewVRegs is not empty, we may have made decisions such as evicting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a virtual register, go with the earlier decisions and use the physical</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2435"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2436"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CSRCost.getFrequency() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2437"><span class="doxyHighlight">        EvictAdvisor-&gt;isUnusedCalleeSavedReg(PhysReg) &amp;&amp; NewVRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2438"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MCRegister CSRReg = tryAssignCSRFirstTime(VirtReg, Order, PhysReg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2439"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                CostPerUseLimit, NewVRegs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2440"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CSRReg || !NewVRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2441"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return now if we decide to use a CSR or create new vregs due to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2442"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pre-splitting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2443"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CSRReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2444"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2445"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PhysReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2446"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Non empty NewVRegs means VirtReg has been split.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2448"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NewVRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2449"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2450"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4">LiveRangeStage</a> Stage = ExtraInfo-&gt;getStage(VirtReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; StageName&#91;Stage&#93; &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; Cascade &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2453"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; ExtraInfo-&gt;getCascade(VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a14d46e70db7e417c8ed5bc66fb295185">reg</a>()) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2454"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2455"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to evict a less worthy live range, but only for ranges from the primary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2456"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// queue. The RS&#95;Split ranges already failed to do this, and they should not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2457"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// get a second chance until they have been split.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Stage != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4aa1960643af2f8c3fe5c97a4cda996619">RS&#95;Split</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2459"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> PhysReg =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2460"><span class="doxyHighlight">            tryEvict(VirtReg, Order, NewVRegs, CostPerUseLimit,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2461"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     FixedRegisters)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2462"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> Hint = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#aba058f684e1b6704e5b4a09f889ec18c">MRI</a>-&gt;getSimpleHint(VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a14d46e70db7e417c8ed5bc66fb295185">reg</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2463"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If VirtReg has a hint and that hint is broken record this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2464"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// virtual register as a recoloring candidate for broken hint.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2465"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Indeed, since we evicted a variable in its neighborhood it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2466"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// likely we can at least partially recolor some of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2467"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// copy-related live-ranges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2468"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Hint &amp;&amp; Hint != PhysReg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2469"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SetOfBrokenHints.insert(&amp;VirtReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2470"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PhysReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2471"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2472"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2473"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((NewVRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>() || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cannot append to existing NewVRegs&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2474"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2475"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The first time we see a live range, don&#39;t try to split or spill.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2476"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Wait until the second time, when all smaller ranges have been allocated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This gives a better picture of the interference to split around.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Stage &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4aa1960643af2f8c3fe5c97a4cda996619">RS&#95;Split</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2479"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ExtraInfo-&gt;setStage(VirtReg, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4aa1960643af2f8c3fe5c97a4cda996619">RS&#95;Split</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2480"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;wait for second round\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2481"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewVRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a14d46e70db7e417c8ed5bc66fb295185">reg</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2482"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2483"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2484"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Stage &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4a9cd7330a76c1cb3b85bc898ff6d80fba">RS&#95;Spill</a> &amp;&amp; !VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange/#a66ff664a97cd3c30de7e873335a0c075">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2486"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try splitting VirtReg or interferences.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewVRegSizeBefore = NewVRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2488"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> PhysReg = trySplit(VirtReg, Order, NewVRegs, FixedRegisters);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2489"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PhysReg || (NewVRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() - NewVRegSizeBefore))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2490"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PhysReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2492"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we couldn&#39;t allocate a register from spilling, there is probably some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// invalid inline assembly. The base class will report it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Stage &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4ab3dc0864c572a7f8895334b0f8d235d4">RS&#95;Done</a> || !VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a1a07a284547e2997c90a6a1be428cd47">isSpillable</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> tryLastChanceRecoloring(VirtReg, Order, NewVRegs, FixedRegisters,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2497"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   RecolorStack, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2499"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2500"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finally spill VirtReg itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="#ae2d5340b4e7995036b512d548dd4a20a">EnableDeferredSpilling</a> ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2503"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ExtraInfo-&gt;getStage(VirtReg) &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4ae983c4728340c2ff4e464b1eb59016ac">RS&#95;Memory</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2504"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: This is experimental and in particular, we do not model</span></CodeLine>
